Glad they taught us how to cook our own from our table

ordered spicy ramen with only 1 pcs wagyu won’t be enough… the wagyu was sooooooo good, ngl.
and 1 the chicken paitan ramen is also good, the broth was amazing and the chicken was so juicy..

nice experience to eat at Halal Wagyu Restaurant in Japan! will come again next trip!
